metadata.name: Emoji Drip
metadata.description:
'Emoji Drip' is an edition of NFTs available exclusively to early supporters of Christian Rex Van Minnen's Van Minion project. 'Emoji Drip' is being released in conjunction with the opening of Christian's exhibition 'Coniunctio' at Ross+Kramer Gallery in NYC in May 2022.

Holders of Series 1 and 2 Van Minion blanks can visit vanminion.fun to claim their 'Emoji Drip'.
